mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_status='Y'

select b.board_No, c.category_Name, b.board_Title, m.member_NickName, a.area_Name, b.board_create_date, b.board_count from board b join b_category c on(c.category_no=b.category_no) join member m on(m.member_no=b.member_no) join area a on(b.area_no=a.area_no) where board_status='Y' order by board_no desc
